mapper.select: SELECT ISNULL(EMP.SA_NAME ,MMR.SA_SABUN_NAME) as "saName" /*연구원명*/ , ISNULL(EMP.SA_JOBX_NAME ,MMR.SA_JOBX_NAME) as "saJobxName" /*직급명*/ , MMR.PATC_STR_DT as "patcStrDt" /*참여시작일*/ , MMR.PATC_END_DT as "patcEndDt" /*참여종료일*/ , (CASE WHEN MMR.SA_FUNC IS NOT NULL AND MMR.SA_FUNC IN ('FO0', 'FG0', 'FB1') THEN 'PL' ELSE '팀원' END) as "saFuncName" /*역할명*/ FROM IRIS_PRJ_TMMR_INFO MMR LEFT OUTER JOIN IRIS_SSO_USER EMP ON MMR.TMMR_EMP_NO = EMP.SA_SABUN_NEW WHERE MMR.PRJ_CD = #{prjCd} AND MMR.TMMR_EMP_NO = EMP.SA_SABUN_NEW ORDER BY MMR.PATC_END_DT, MMR.SA_FUNC DESC, EMP.SA_NAME ASC
